task.prompt: In a polar coordinate system, the midpoint of the line segment whose endpoints are $\left( 8, \frac{5 \pi}{12} \right)$ and $\left( 8, -\frac{3 \pi}{12} \right)$ is the point $(r, \theta).$  Enter $(r, \theta),$ where $r > 0$ and $0 \le \theta < 2 \pi.$
